list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut the wool off (a sheep or other animal).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Paul has never sheared a sheep before
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Paul chưa bao giờ cắt một con cừu trước đây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: break off or cause to break off, owing to a structural strain.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the derailleur sheared and jammed in the rear wheel
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Derailleur cắt và bị kẹt ở bánh sau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a strain in the structure of a substance produced by pressure, when its layers are laterally shifted in relation to each other.
